spl_product_data_elements: Bestmade Natural Products BIO9 Ferr Phos, Kali Mur, Kali Phos, Mag Phos POTASSIUM PHOSPHATE, DIBASIC PHOSPHATE ION MAGNESIUM PHOSPHATE, DIBASIC TRIHYDRATE MAGNESIUM CATION POTASSIUM CHLORIDE POTASSIUM CATION FERROSOFERRIC PHOSPHATE FERROSOFERRIC PHOSPHATE ALCOHOL TASTELESS LIQUID CLEAR LIQUID
dosage_and_administration: How to Use Mix with half a cup of water 3-4 times per day. Ages 12 or older, 10 drops. Ages 12-2, 5 drops. Ages 2 and under, consult your Doctor.
